column1: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?

column2: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
column3: Not being able to stop or control worrying
column4: Worrying too much about different things
column6: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
column8: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen

column1: More than half of the days
